mapper.insert: INSERT INTO phong ( iddmphong, giobatdau, gioketthuc, ngay, songuoi, mucdich, nguoidaidien ) VALUES ( #{idDmPhong}, TIME_FORMAT(#{gioBatDau},'%H:%i:00'), TIME_FORMAT(#{gioKetThuc},'%H:%i:00'), STR_TO_DATE(#{ngay}, '%d/%m/%Y'), #{soNguoi}, #{mucDich}, #{nguoiDaiDien} )
mapper.select: SELECT ph.idphong, TIME_FORMAT(ph.giobatdau,'%H:%i') AS giobatdau, TIME_FORMAT(ph.gioketthuc,'%H:%i') AS gioketthuc, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(ph.ngay,'%d/%m/%Y'),'') AS ngay, tt.trangthai, ph.songuoi, ph.mucdich, nd.ten AS tennguoidaidien FROM phong ph LEFT JOIN dmtrangthai tt ON ph.trangthai = tt.idtrangthai LEFT JOIN nguoidung nd ON ph.nguoidaidien = nd.idnguoidung WHERE ph.iddmphong = #{idDmPhong} AND ph.ngay >= now()
